general.content: Mistral AI SAS is a French artificial intelligence company founded in 2023 by former DeepMind and Meta researchers. The company champions open-source AI development with European values at its core. Mistral Large 2 represents their flagship enterprise model, developed entirely within EU jurisdiction.

properties.content: Mistral Large 2 utilises an optimised Transformer architecture focusing on efficiency and performance for text generation. The model implements sliding window attention and grouped-query attention for improved inference speed. Architecture design prioritises deployment flexibility across various hardware configurations.

distribution.content: Distribution occurs through Mistral's La Plateforme API service and open weights on Hugging Face under Apache 2.0 licence. The open-source approach enables self-hosting and customisation for enterprise needs. Cloud partnerships provide additional deployment options across major platforms.

use.content: Usage terms follow standard Apache 2.0 licensing with additional guidelines for responsible AI deployment. Mistral encourages ethical use whilst maintaining permissive licensing for commercial applications. The terms explicitly support EU AI Act compliance requirements.

data.content: Training data details not publicly disclosed.
